Ashem.title: Ashem
Ashem.name: [color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color]
Ashem.brief: The God of discipline and cosmic sanctity. Worshipped as a divine judge by those who wander the desert of the gods. Rewards correct ritual procedure
Ashem.description_start: Prayers grant healing and deal Astral damage
Ashem.prayer:
O [color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color],

of wisdom's many paths,

I am subject to myself,

preserve my life!
Ashem.description:
You worship [color=#8080f0]Ashem, the Righteous[/color]. 

As a new follower, you may call upon [color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color] to restore your life through recitation of the [color=#8080f0]Med Vohu[/color] [color=#ffff50]I[/color]. 

As your glory increases, [color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color] will grant you the ability to channel your attributes into [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage through the [color=#8080f0]Yazata[/color] [color=#ffff50]II[/color] and [color=#8080f0]Vendi[/color] [color=#ffff50]III[/color]. 

[color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color] admires correct ritual procedure; each prayer is charged by the preceding prayer, and all prayers grant temporary [color=#80a0f0]Grace[/color], which reduces the damage you take

Humbaba.title: Humbaba
Humbaba.name: [color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color]
Humbaba.brief: The wilderness-born God of war and bloodshed. Despises civilization. Rewards the amplification of rage
Humbaba.description_start: Prayers bestow Bloodrage, deal Blood damage and grant healing
Humbaba.prayer:
O [color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color],

of the eight circles of fear,

whose eyes are my blood,

who dances in the fire-cloud,

destroyer of peace,

I invoke thee!
Humbaba.description:
You worship [color=#a03030]Humbaba, the Beast of War[/color]. 

As a new follower, you may call upon [color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color] to grant [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color] through recitation of the [color=#a03030]Sum Uri[/color] [color=#ffff50]I[/color]. This prayer removes [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color] from you and applies additional [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color] for each removed [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color].

As your glory increases, [color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color] will grant you the ability to deal [color=#ff2020]Blood[/color] damage to enemies in the area through the [color=#a03030]Ur Halhala[/color] [color=#ffff50]II[/color] and to directly heal at the cost of applying [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color] to yourself through the [color=#a03030]Ur Damu[/color] [color=#ffff50]III[/color].

[color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color] rewards several applications of [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color], granting increased healing when you hit enemies and multiplying the effects of [color=#a03030]Ur Halhala[/color].

Ninhurs.title: Ninhurs
Ninhurs.name: [color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color]
Ninhurs.brief: The Goddess of growth and decay. Vigorous offspring of the green mother. Rewards the sacrifice of enemies upon her divine grass
Ninhurs.description_start: Prayers grant healing, spread divine grass, deal Poison damage and summon divine serpents
Ninhurs.prayer:
O [color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color],

of the vine's blue flower,

of life's continuous eruption,

of stem and bursted rock,

whose temple is grass,

I kneel to thee!
Ninhurs.description:
You worship [color=#20af20]Ninhurs, the Green Mother[/color]. 

As a new follower, you may call upon [color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color] to heal you and cleanse you of [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color] through recitation of the [color=#20af20]Leget Mhor[/color] [color=#ffff50]I[/color]. 

As your glory increases, [color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color] will grant you the ability to deal high [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to nearby enemies through the [color=#20af20]Uttuk Alu[/color] [color=#ffff50]II[/color] and to summon divine serpents through the [color=#20af20]Loh Musma[/color] [color=#ffff50]III[/color].

[color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color] rewards your presence on [color=#ffff50]divine grass[/color] with increased healing and the application of [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] on enemies. As enemies die on [color=#ffff50]divine grass[/color], the [color=#20af20]Leget Mhor[/color] and [color=#20af20]Uttuk Alu[/color] will rapidly regain charges.

Mehtar.title: Mehtar
Mehtar.name: [color=#60b0ff]Mehtar[/color]
Mehtar.brief: The Goddess of ice and illusions. Said to dwell within the high glaciers at the edge of the world. Rewards descent into her immaculate dream
Mehtar.description_start: Prayers bestow Dream and deal Ice / Psychic damage
Mehtar.prayer:
O [color=#60b0ff]Mehtar[/color],

of the unmoving illusion,

who carries the mind,

on blue feathers...

bless this sleep!

Dumuzi.title: Dumuzi
Dumuzi.name: [color=#d09000]Dumuzi[/color]
Dumuzi.brief: The God of the golden tomb. The slain consort of Eris. Rewards the preservation of his sacred entourage and the accumulation of armor
Dumuzi.description_start: Prayers grant healing and deal Death / Fire damage based on Armor
Dumuzi.prayer:
O [color=#d09000]Dumuzi[/color],

of the glittering mound,

no treasure escapes you,

your silent army,

with limbs of gold,

accept this offering!

Hadad.title: Hadad
Hadad.name: [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color]
Hadad.brief: The God of wildfire and storms. Presided over the first lowering of the waters. Favors those who perform the dance of pure combat
Hadad.description_start: Prayers grant healing and deal Lightning / Fire damage
Hadad.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!
Hadad.description: You worship [color=#ff8000]Hadad, the Lord of Storms[/color]

Eresh.title: Eresh
Eresh.name: [color=#a0a000]Eresh[/color]
Eresh.brief: The Goddess of life-hunger and the wretched dead. Presides in grief within the corpse of her divine mother. Exults in the death of allies and the gathering of artifacts
Eresh.description_start: Prayers summon Slouching Dead and fearsome Mouths of Eresh
Eresh.prayer:
O [color=#a0a000]Eresh[/color],

of the consuming grave,

whose army slouches from the mire,

whose womb is decay itself,

of the breathless multitude,

of the muttering annihilation,

comfort me!
Eresh.description: You worship [color=#a0a000]Eresh, the Queen of the Dead[/color]

Dorok.title: Dorok
Dorok.name: [color=#cf6f40]Dorok[/color]
Dorok.brief: The God of stoic resolve and honorable combat. Dwells within a nameless mountain in the wilderness of Achra. Rewards injury and perseverance
Dorok.description_start: Prayers grant healing, purge effects, deal Blunt damage and perform extra attacks
Dorok.prayer:
O [color=#cf6f40]Dorok[/color],

unmoving visage,

you do not listen,

I do not care,

strengthen me,

if you wish...

Tengri.title: Tengri
Tengri.name: [color=#60ffb0]Tengri[/color]
Tengri.brief: The God of the cutting wind. Inhabits the open sky of the eastern desert. Rewards alacrity and risk
Tengri.description_start: Prayers grant healing, purge Freeze / Entangle / Sickness and deal Slash damage in an area
Tengri.prayer:
O [color=#cf6f40]Dorok[/color],

unmoving visage,

you do not listen,

I do not care,

strengthen me,

if you wish...

Azhdaha.title: Azhdaha
Azhdaha.name: [color=#ff5000]Azhdaha[/color]
Azhdaha.brief: The stone Goddess of draconic transformation whose body dwells deep within the mountain temple-lands. Blesses followers with a fearsome Drakeform
Azhdaha.description_start: Prayers grant healing, deal area damage and increase Drakeform stacks
Azhdaha.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Formus.title: Formus
Formus.name: [color=#ffa0f0]Formus[/color]
Formus.brief: The God of the cosmic anthill whose children still dwell in the fading tunnels of the astral dark. Rewards those who summon and fight alongside his holy ants
Formus.description_start: Prayers summon a multitude of Ants and empower your summons
Formus.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Eris.title: Eris
Eris.name: [color=#fff0a0]Eris[/color]
Eris.brief: The Goddess of struggle. Worshipped by the divine warrior Dumuzi before his ascent to godhood. Rewards individual power
Eris.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Oros.title: Oros
Oros.name: [color=#8040a0]Oros[/color]
Oros.brief: The monster-Goddess of the devouring night. A sibling of the "star-eaters" who was long ago cast down to Achra. Rewards those who wear her corrupt vestiges
Oros.description_start: Prayers grant healing and summon Tentacles
Oros.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Pallas.title: Pallas
Pallas.name: [color=#ff7070]Pallas[/color]
Pallas.brief: The Goddess of defense and craftiness. Was once the divine guardian of lost Shuppurak. Rewards Off-hand combat and blocking
Pallas.description_start: Prayers grant healing, deal pierce damage and upgrade your Off-hand weapon
Pallas.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Fawdaa.title: Fawdaa
Fawdaa.name: [color=#90ff60]Fawdaa[/color]
Fawdaa.brief: The God of chaos and disembodiment. Scorned father of the gruesome Umbraliths. Rewards constant teleportation
Fawdaa.description_start: Prayers randomly teleport self, allies and enemies
Fawdaa.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Mardok.title: Mardok
Mardok.name: [color=#ff8030]Mardok[/color]
Mardok.brief: The God of the lost stone city of beasts. Blesses followers with a heavy-horned "Helm of Mardok"
Mardok.description_start: Prayers empower allies and summon Beasts of Mardok
Mardok.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Yu.title: Yu
Yu.name: [color=#50f080]Yu[/color]
Yu.brief: The "poisoned stone" of lost Shuppurak; forbidden Goddess of jade. Rewards slowness
Yu.description_start: Prayers apply Refraction, re-apply your Effects and deal poison damage
Yu.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Ikshana.title: Ikshana
Ikshana.name: [color=#0070ff]Ikshana[/color]
Ikshana.brief: The divine eye that once stood at the end of the star-path. Now sealed in glimmering stone. Summons enchanted Prismas of the three sacred hues
Ikshana.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Phoenix.title: Phoenix
Phoenix.name: [color=#ff9000]Phoenix[/color]
Phoenix.brief: The Goddess of the lost sun. The vanished "first light" of Achra. Allows worshippers to rebirth themselves in glorious flames
Phoenix.description_start: Prayers apply Blind, Scorch, and increase damage dealt
Phoenix.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Dudar.title: Dudar
Dudar.name: [color=#ffd000]the Worm[/color]
Dudar.brief: The eternal Worm that slumbers beneath the desert of the gods. Provides a mighty aura of psychic corrosion through the Du' Eird ritual of mental sacrifice
Dudar.description_start: Prayers apply Corrosion to yourself and deal Psychic damage to enemies
Dudar.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Agara.title: Agara
Agara.name: [color=#ff50ff]Agara[/color]
Agara.brief: The God of sorcerers; lord of the four calamities. Patriarch of the divine siblings Ragna, Auzom, Sita and Rabal. Empowers followers with destructive magic
Agara.description_start: Prayers deal Astral, Lightning, Fire and Ice damage in an area
Agara.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Takhal.title: Takhal
Takhal.name: [color=#80af00]Takhal[/color]
Takhal.brief: The God of plagues, whose visage is a jeweled altar of dark stone, hidden in the eastern desert. Known as the "shadow that follows the wind," Takhal is the eternal enemy of Tengri, and is said to grant a wretched vitality
Takhal.description_start: Prayers grant healing, increase max life and deal Death / Poison damage to yourself
Takhal.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Angra.title: Angra
Angra.name: [color=#90ff20]Angra[/color]
Angra.brief: The "lawless beast" from underground; presides over hunger, nameless chasms and monstrosity. Loathes the stars and demands the blood-offering of one's followers, seeking the divine upheaval of the earth
Angra.description_start: Prayers deal Poison / Blood damage, grant healing and apply Sickness / Bleed
Angra.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!

Apophis.title: Apophis
Apophis.name: [color=#700090]Apophis[/color]
Apophis.brief: The long serpent of the outer dark, the dust-void past all light. Apophis is the ancient enemy of Phoenix. Those who worship Apophis invite their own destruction, in exchange for unnatural, ever-increasing Strength
Apophis.description_start: Prayers deal Astral damage and remove harmful Effects from yourself
Apophis.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!
